member.name: T:Sudoku.Drawing.Old.ColorId
member.summary: Extracts the extension methods for color ID.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.Old.ColorId.ToCustomColorId(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Convert the current quadruple to a custom color ID.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.Old.ColorId.IsCustomColorId(System.Int64,System.Byte@,System.Byte@,System.Byte@,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Check whether the color ID holds a custom color.
member.remarks: objects holds key and value two properties, where is the key. Here ID can save a color value quadruple if the higher 32 bits are 0xDEAD. The last 32 bits are A, R, G, B value from one color. Otherwise the ID value is only between -4 and 10 (at present, who knows whether the range will be extended larger or not).

member.summary: Try to parse the string, and convert it to a color ID.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Drawing.Old.Settings
member.summary: Provides with a base class for program settings.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.Old.Settings.TryGetPaletteColor(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color@)
member.summary: Try to get the palette color using the specified index.
member.returns: A indicating whether the operation is successful.

summary.para: Indicates whether the form shows candidates.
The value is in default case.
Indicates whether the grid painter will use new algorithm to render a region (lighter).
The value is in author reserved case.
Indicates the scale of values.
The value is 0.9M in default case.
Indicates the scale of candidates.
The value is 0.3M in default case.
Indicates the grid line width of the sudoku grid to render.
The value is 1.5F in default case.
Indicates the block line width of the sudoku grid to render.
The value is 3F in default case.
Indicates the font of given digits to render.
The value is "Fira Code" in author-reserved environment, "Arial" in other ones.
Indicates the font of modifiable digits to render.
The value is "Fira Code" in author-reserved environment, "Arial" in other ones.
Indicates the font of candidate digits to render.
The value is "Fira Code" in author-reserved environment, "Arial" in other ones.
Indicates the given digits to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the modifiable digits to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the candidate digits to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the color used for painting for focused cells.
The value is #20FFFF00 ( with alpha 32) in default case.
Indicates the background color of the sudoku grid to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the grid line color of the sudoku grid to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the block line color of the sudoku grid to render.
The value is in default case.
Indicates the color of the crosshatching outline.
The value is with the alpha 192 in debugger mode, with the alpha 192 in release mode in default case.
Indicates the color of the crosshatching inner.
The value is in author-reserved environment, in other ones in default case.
Indicates the color of the cross sign.
The value is with the alpha 192 in default case.
